name: Ricochet (itch) (divyamsureka1@gmail.com)
description:
A multiplayer  shmup with a slight strategic edge!

To damage your opponent, you will have to bonce off your bullets from a surface!

Be careful, of not hitting your opponent directly as this would cause him to gain health.

Also you can bonce off your bullets only from your energy blocks!

Put your creativity into the game to create custom layouts of your own!

This game requires that a gamepad (Xbox,PS3,PS4 controllers etc.) be connected in order to play.

This game was made within 7 days for Game Jam Titans Mumbai hosted by NASSCOM. This game was the runner up in that competition.

We are thinking of expanding it by making it on a local multiplayer host.

Donations would be really appreciated to give us an impetus to keep going.

Thank You!!
